Baby.Title: Baby
Baby.Actors: Akshay Kumar, Danny Denzongpa, Rana Daggubati, Tapsee Pannu
Baby.Plot: An elite counter-intelligence unit learns of a plot, masterminded by a maniacal madman. With the clock ticking, it's up to them to track the terrorists' international tentacles and prevent them from striking at the heart of India.

Full Metal Jacket.Title: Full Metal Jacket
Full Metal Jacket.Actors: Matthew Modine, Adam Baldwin, Vincent D'Onofrio, R. Lee Ermey
Full Metal Jacket.Plot: A pragmatic U.S. Marine observes the dehumanizing effects the Vietnam War has on his fellow recruits from their brutal boot camp training to the bloody street fighting in Hue.

Full Metal Jacket.Title: The Shining
Full Metal Jacket.Actors: Jack Nicholson, Shelley Duvall, Danny Lloyd, Scatman Crothers
Full Metal Jacket.Plot: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where an evil and spiritual presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from the past and of the future.

Full Metal Jacket.Title: The Proposal
Full Metal Jacket.Actors: Sandra Bullock, Ryan Reynolds, Mary Steenburgen, Craig T. Nelson
Full Metal Jacket.Plot: A pushy boss (Sandra Bullock) forces her young assistant (Ryan Reynolds) to marry her in order to keep her Visa status in the U.S. and avoid deportation to Canada.
